info.name: Offboarding API - Recruitment Subsystem
info.description: Complete Postman collection for testing all offboarding endpoints including termination reviews, checklists, notifications, resignations, access revocation, and department clearances.

body.raw:
{
  "employeeId": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439011",
  "contractId": "507f1f77bcf86cd799439012",
  "initiator": "HR",
  "reason": "Poor performance based on recent appraisal reviews and multiple warnings.",
  "employeeComments": "Employee has been given multiple opportunities for improvement.",
  "hrComments": "Termination justified based on performance data from Q3 and Q4 2025."
}

request.description: HR Manager initiates a termination review. Returns 201 on success, 400 for invalid input, 404 if employee/contract not found.
Creates offboarding checklist with department approvals and equipment tracking. Returns 201 on success, 400 if checklist already exists, 404 if termination request not found.
Sends notification to HR/Finance/Payroll for benefits termination and final pay calculation. Calculates unused leave for encashment. Returns 201 on success, 404 if termination request not found.

request.description: Employee submits resignation request. Initiates approval workflow. Returns 201 on success, 400 if active resignation exists, 404 if employee/contract not found.
Employee tracks their resignation request status. Returns all resignations with current status. Returns 200 on success, 404 if employee not found.
System Admin revokes all system access for terminated employee. Updates status to TERMINATED and deactivates roles. Returns 200 on success, 400 if termination not approved, 404 if not found.
